amendment.description: Amendment provides funds for the VA to report on its implementation of energy efficiency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make funds available to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to comply with the Department's energy management requirements under section 543(f)(7) of the National Energy Conservation Policy Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Welch.
